careerPaths.title: AI Engineer
careerPaths.description: Build and deploy intelligent systems using machine learning and deep learning technologies. You will design models that can learn from data and make decisions.

careerPaths.title: Full Stack Developer
careerPaths.description: Master both frontend and backend technologies to build complete web applications. You will handle everything from user interface to database management.

careerPaths.title: Data Scientist
careerPaths.description: Extract insights from complex data sets to drive business decisions. You will use statistical methods and visualization tools to tell stories with data.

careerPaths.title: UX/UI Designer
careerPaths.description: Design intuitive and beautiful user interfaces. You will focus on user experience research, wireframing, and high-fidelity prototyping.

careerPaths.title: DevOps Engineer
careerPaths.description: Bridge the gap between development and operations. You will automate deployment pipelines and ensure system reliability and scalability.

careerPaths.title: Product Manager
careerPaths.description: Lead the vision and strategy for software products. You will work with engineering, design, and marketing teams to deliver product success.

careerPaths.title: Blockchain Developer
careerPaths.description: Develop decentralized applications and smart contracts. You will work with distributed ledger technologies to build secure and transparent systems.

careerPaths.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
careerPaths.description: Protect organizations from cyber threats. You will monitor networks, identify vulnerabilities, and implement security protocols.

careerPaths.title: Cloud Architect
careerPaths.description: Design and manage cloud infrastructure strategies. You will ensure that cloud systems are secure, reliable, and cost-effective.

careerPaths.title: Mobile App Developer
careerPaths.description: Create applications for iOS and Android devices. You will build performant and responsive mobile experiences using native or cross-platform tools.

learningResources.title: Complete Python Bootcamp
learningResources.description: Learn Python from scratch to advanced features. Covers decorators, generators, and working with files.

learningResources.title: React - The Complete Guide
learningResources.description: Dive deep into React.js. Learn Hooks, Redux, React Router, and Next.js.

learningResources.title: Machine Learning Concepts Explained
learningResources.description: Visual explanation of core ML concepts like Gradient Descent, Neural Networks, and Backpropagation.

learningResources.title: Build a Full Stack App with Next.js
learningResources.description: Hands-on project building a social media clone using Next.js, Prisma, and PostgreSQL.

learningResources.title: Google Data Analytics Professional Certificate
learningResources.description: Gain in-demand skills in data analytics. Learn to use spreadsheets, SQL, Tableau, and R.

learningResources.title: System Design Interview Guide
learningResources.description: Comprehensive guide to acing system design interviews. Covers scalability, load balancing, and database design.

learningResources.title: Deep Learning Specialization
learningResources.description: Master Deep Learning, and break into AI. content by Andrew Ng.

learningResources.title: Figma for UI/UX Design
learningResources.description: Crash course on using Figma for interface design and prototyping.

learningResources.title: Docker and Kubernetes: The Complete Guide
learningResources.description: Build, test, and deploy Docker applications with Kubernetes while learning production-style development workflows.

learningResources.title: Smart Contract Development with Solidity
learningResources.description: Learn to write smart contracts and build DApps on Ethereum.

startupIdeas.title: AI Legal Assistant for Freelancers
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Freelancers often struggle with complex contracts and legal jargon, leading to payment disputes and unfair terms.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: An AI-powered document reviewer that highlights risky clauses and suggests clearer terms in seconds.

startupIdeas.title: Vertical SaaS for Plumbers
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Small plumbing businesses rely on pen-and-paper for scheduling, invoicing, and inventory, causing inefficiency.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: All-in-one mobile app for scheduling, dispatching, and invoicing specifically designed for plumbing workflows.

startupIdeas.title: Micro-Influencer Marketplace for Niche Brands
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Small brands can't afford big influencers, and micro-influencers struggle to monetize their dedicated following.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: A platform that automatically matches niche brands with micro-influencers (1k-10k followers) based on audience data.

startupIdeas.title: Automated Employee Onboarding Platform
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Remote companies spend weeks coordinating logins, equipment shipping, and training for new hires.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: IT automation platform that provisions accounts, orders laptops, and assigns training modules with one click.

startupIdeas.title: Personalized Vitamin Subscription
startupIdeas.problem_statement: People take generic vitamins that don't match their specific blood work or lifestyle needs.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: DTC brand offering monthly vitamin packs based on a quiz or imported blood test results.

startupIdeas.title: Local Event Discovery for Remote Workers
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Remote workers feel isolated and struggle to find social events happening during the week.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: Community app curating co-working pop-ups, happy hours, and networking events for digital nomads.

startupIdeas.title: AI-Powered Tutoring for Dyslexic Students
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Traditional tutoring doesn't adapt to the specific learning patterns of students with dyslexia.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: Adaptive learning platform using speech-to-text and special fonts/colors to help dyslexic kids read and write.

startupIdeas.title: Sustainable Packaging Marketplace
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Small e-commerce shops want eco-friendly packaging but can't meet the high MOQs of large suppliers.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: B2B marketplace aggregating orders from small shops to unlock bulk rates for sustainable packaging.

startupIdeas.title: VR Training for Hazardous Jobs
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Training oil rig workers or firefighters is dangerous and expensive in real life.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: VR simulation software allowing employees to practice safety protocols in a realistic, risk-free environment.

startupIdeas.title: No-Code API Builder
startupIdeas.problem_statement: Non-technical founders can build frontends (Webflow) but struggle to build custom backends/APIs.
startupIdeas.solution_summary: Visual interface to define database schemas and API endpoints that deploy instantly to serverless infrastructure.
